explanation: [0-0] In a snowy field, a man in a white shirt and black pants stands holding a bag of flour in his right hand and a bottle of cola in his left hand. A pair of hands reaches up from the bottom of the screen. Above the man, a caption with a white background and black text appears, reading "Flour" with a soccer ball icon and a white plus sign below it. Further down, a caption with a red background and white text reads "Cola," accompanied by a yellow tennis ball icon below. There are trees in the background.

[0-6] First, the hands at the bottom open up. The man in white shakes the cola bottle and walks toward the outstretched hands, pouring the flour and cola into them. He then throws the flour bag and cola bottle to the ground on the right side and steps back. The outstretched hands come together, palms touching, and rub the mixture a few times, getting covered in chocolate-colored dough.
